attributes.action: Pay hunters fuel,give them a stab proof vest and body cams
attributes.additional_details: To protect our children from online grooming
attributes.background: I want you to take away the stigma for pedophile hunters, offer them their fuel back, give them body cams and vests to help the war of online grooming. They do it for free anyway but they could at least be offered this for freeing up police officers time.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government is responsible for funding law enforcement, including law enforcement efforts to prevent child sexual abuse and arrest people guilty of child sexual abuse offences. The Government is not responsible for funding private individuals involved in seeking to identify people who may be guilty of criminal offences.
